name: 2025 The 10th International Conference on Knowledge Engineering and Applications
content: Publication: The accepted papers of ICKEA2025 will be published on the Journal-IJIET, which will be submitted for indexing in Scopus etc. major databases. International Journal of Information and Education Technology ISSN: 2010-3689 (Online) Abbreviated Title: Int. J. Inf. Educ. Technol. Editor-in-Chief: Prof. Jon-Chao Hong Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (CiteScore 2023: 2.8), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Google Scholar
